name: Pearl Bead - White
description: Classic white freshwater pearl bead with lustrous finish
svg_element: <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="4" fill="#F8F8FF" stroke="#E6E6FA" stroke-width="0.5" opacity="0.9"><animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.9;1;0.9" dur="3s" repeatCount="indefinite"/></circle>

name: Pearl Bead - Cream
svg_element: <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="4" fill="#FFF8DC" stroke="#F5DEB3" stroke-width="0.5" opacity="0.9"><animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.9;1;0.9" dur="3s" repeatCount="indefinite"/></circle>

name: Gold Bead - Round
svg_element: <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="3.5" fill="url(#goldGradient)"><defs><radialGradient id="goldGradient" cx="30%" cy="30%"><stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:#FFD700"/><stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:#B8860B"/></radialGradient></defs></circle>

name: Rose Gold Bead - Round
description: Warm rose gold filled round bead
svg_element: <circle cx="0" cy="0" r="3.5" fill="url(#roseGoldGradient)"><defs><radialGradient id="roseGoldGradient" cx="30%" cy="30%"><stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:#E8B4B8"/><stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:#CD7F32"/></radialGradient></defs></circle>

name: Crystal Bead - Clear
svg_element: <g><circle cx="0" cy="0" r="4" fill="#F0F8FF" stroke="#E0E6FF" stroke-width="0.5" opacity="0.8"/><circle cx="-1" cy="-1" r="1" fill="#FFFFFF" opacity="0.6"/><animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.8;1;0.8" dur="2s" repeatCount="indefinite"/></g>

name: Crystal Bead - Pink
svg_element: <g><circle cx="0" cy="0" r="4" fill="#FFB6C1" stroke="#FF69B4" stroke-width="0.5" opacity="0.8"/><circle cx="-1" cy="-1" r="1" fill="#FFFFFF" opacity="0.6"/><animate attributeName="opacity" values="0.8;1;0.8" dur="2s" repeatCount="indefinite"/></g>
